text:
RT @DanCrenshawTX Thanks for having me @nbcsnl. What an experience! And what a way to highlight the importance of honoring our vets, especially this weekend. #neverforget  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKaakjMVtyE

RT @itsmebeccam “What the nation will need when the 116th Congress is seated in January is a speaker who is an experienced leader who not only knows where the levers of power are, but who also knows how to use them and, most importantly, isn’t afraid to use them.”

This. All of it. https://twitter.com/capehartj/status/1061633143826857984 QT @CapehartJ This is no time for on-the-job training. 4 reasons why Nancy Pelosi must be the next Speaker of the House. https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/post-partisan/wp/2018/11/07/why-president-trump-makes-a-speaker-pelosi-an-absolute-necessity/?bvjdklbfkg&utm_term=.b3f4f7bb9b12
No one has greater love than this, to lay down one’s life for one’s friends. John 15:13

Here is the simple truth. Donald Trump, like his friends in Russia, Saudi Arabia and North Korea, is an authoritarian leader who does not believe in democracy. The election officials in FL, GA and AZ must ignore the rantings of this president and COUNT EVERY VOTE.

RT @grantstern Democrats ushered in the next generation of leadership to the House with this year's #BlueWave.

But we need proven leadership at the top right now.

I support @TeamPelosi's bid for Speaker because she'll deliver the progressive agenda we voted for. https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/post-partisan/wp/2018/11/07/why-president-trump-makes-a-speaker-pelosi-an-absolute-necessity/?bvjdklbfkg&utm_term=.bbd951fb4629

“Nancy Pelosi is battle tested” - incoming House Oversight Committee Chairman and longtime government reform champion ⁦@RepCummings⁩ supports #TeamPelosi. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr0A5lrUUAAlY9E.jpg
Now is the time to #GetCovered! Find your closest enrollment center for getting a health insurance plan in California here: https://storefronts.coveredca.com/

Wrong. It is the #BrowardCounty canvassing board that claims her vote is illegal, not me. 

If what your reporting found is accurate, then you have confirmed what I have been saying, that we have ample reason to carefully scrutinize the actions of the BrowardElection supervisor. https://twitter.com/pemalevy/status/1061640679779123203 QT @pemalevy I spoke to one of the voters Rubio claims broke the law. She is 29 and works 2 jobs. She followed instructions at her polling station & provided a valid photo ID. She has no idea why her ballot was rejected. Likely her signature was deemed a mismatch  https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2018/11/one-voter-broward-county-florida-election/ https://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/1061378298276655104

Every vote legally cast & received within timeframe required by law should be counted. 

The issue in #Florida has been the repeated violations of election law by & the incompetence & the lack of transparency of #PalmBeachElections & #BrowardElections.

#SaluteToService https://twitter.com/nfl/status/1061619620845625344 QT @NFL We're up OVER $1.5M!
Let's get to $2M today!

TODAY ONLY we’re raising the donation to $25 per tweet when you use #SaluteToService.

Keep tweeting! Retweets count! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DruhaxjWkAA07yc.jpg

RT @GregAbbott_TX The fires in California are a tragedy & Texas will send our bravest to help out. Approximately 200 firefighters and support personnel with 55 engines, along with teams from the Texas Forest Service at Texas A&M will head to California. #txlege ⁦⁦ http://cbsaustin.com/news/local/governor-abbott-to-deploy-texas-firefighters-to-california

Today on this #VeteransDay18 we honor the men & women who serve or have served our nation in uniform. 

One thing that all Americans on is that we are grateful to our veterans & their families for the sacrifices they have made & are making for us. #USA
Congrats Justice-elect @Stewart4OhioSC on a historic victory! http://radio.wosu.org/post/first-black-woman-elected-ohio-supreme-court#stream/0

My heart goes out to everyone affected by the deadly California wildfires, especially those who have lost loved ones. Grateful to the many brave firefighters & first responders who are putting their lives on the line to keep others safe, today and every day. America is with you.
Every vote, at every polling place, in every state deserves to be counted. Every voice must be heard. That is what our democracy is all about.

RT @RedCrossLA Please avoid bringing donated items like food and clothing to Red Cross shelters in #LACounty & #VenturaCounty at this time. Learn more: https://vimeo.com/287073847 #WoolseyFire #HillFire http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Drv9TibXcAERYf9.jpg

“Congresswoman-Elect Deb Haaland (D-NM) will be a fierce, effective advocate for Native women, public education, and renewable energy. Proud to have her support.” -NP  #TeamPelosi #NM01

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bP6FxAXFL_CUg93Xg_FX3t73YGjS70EZ/view?usp=sharing

We have to follow through on our promises to our veterans. Congress expanded the GI Bill – now the VA needs to ensure vets get what they’ve earned. I introduced a bipartisan bill to make sure vets aren’t penalized financially for the VA’s mistakes. The Senate should pass it. https://twitter.com/nbcnews/status/1061853871318949888 QT @NBCNews Veterans haven't received GI Bill benefits for months due to a series of information technology glitches at the Department of Veterans Affairs https://nbcnews.trib.al/PYN2MEM

RT @LCVoters .@NancyPelosi was the most pro-environment Speaker of the House in our nation’s history, including making climate action a top priority. We look forward to working with her as the next Speaker of the House. #ActOnClimate https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/trump-is-right-nancy-pelosi-should-be-the-next-speaker/2018/11/07/0add7b6e-e2a7-11e8-8f5f-a55347f48762_story.html

RT @sacbee_news Watch as a volunteer fire captain becomes emotional when he discovers his childhood church has been spared by the flames of the #CampFire http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1061751168802660352/pu/img/-Tzo-qg7UyeBATLO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1061751168802660352/pu/vid/320x180/wRjtjJVYwloTwjYw.mp4?tag=5

RT @EastBayTimes Opinion: Trump administration rule would worsen Bay Area hunger https://trib.al/f6R0YFs http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DraJBE6XcAAOtAZ.jpg

Honored to join @RutgersU student veterans today to announce my new bill, the VET Extension ACT, to address critical gaps in education benefits for student veterans. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1M6yQX4AQnHqK.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1M607WwAIn7nR.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1M6r7X4AEFHB5.jpg

.@brianschatz & I are calling on the @TheJusticeDept to investigate reports of possible voter suppression in the Georgia gubernatorial election. The DOJ has the authority & obligation to enforce the Voting Rights Act & should ensure all votes are counted. https://www.apnews.com/baf3626380d34514be73114abf36e63b

Spread the word to people in Southern California who may be displaced from the fires: if you are in need of a place to stay, Airbnb is offering free stays to evacuees, emergency workers, and volunteers. 
https://www.nbclosangeles.com/news/local/Airbnb-Free-Stay-Woolsey-Fire-Hill-Fire-Evacuees--500301612.html

“The next Speaker of the House must be a shrewd, battle-tested negotiator who understands how to out-maneuver Republicans & continue to build on gains Democrats made under Nancy’s leadership.” –incoming Ways & Means Committee Chair Rep. Richard Neal (D-MA) endorses #TeamPelosi. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1am1vUwAAEE7i.jpg

The damage caused by CA wildfires is catastrophic. To help affected communities and individuals rebuild, the Administration must immediately make a disaster declaration to expedite federal assistance. These families and communities need help now.
“We need the strongest general that we have.”-incoming House Intelligence Committee Chair ⁦@AdamSchiff⁩ endorses #TeamPelosi for Speaker. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1xaGEUcAA7Av6.jpg

“In fight after fight you have stood with the hard-working women and men of ⁦AFSCME⁩ and AFSCME stands with you.” -Lee Saunders, President, @AFSCME. #TeamPelosi. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1qKT1U4AASjPa.jpg
Let’s work together for a cleaner, healthier environment. Thank you for your endorsement, ⁦@LCVoters⁩! -NP #TeamPelosi #ActOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr16ZgkU4AAfSlO.jpg
RT @CNBC Republicans declared war on Nancy Pelosi on Election Night — and she won, @JohnJHarwood writes. https://trib.al/N5YT2v3

Congratulations @kyrstensinema on your historic victory —Arizona is in good hands! I look forward to working together in the Senate.
https://twitter.com/rollcall/status/1062146063749054464 QT @rollcall BREAKING: Democratic Rep. Kyrsten Sinema has defeated Republican Rep. Martha McSally to become first woman elected to represent Arizona in the Senate https://www.rollcall.com/news/politics/arizona-senate-mcsally-sinema-history

Stan Lee was a creative genius; he brought to life wise-cracking super heroes w/ heart & humanity—from the X Men & Daredevil to my all-time favorite Spider-Man. On behalf of the millions of kids & adults you brought joy, laughter, acceptance & insight, THANK YOU. Rest In Peace. https://twitter.com/therealstanlee/status/1062078268319268864 QT @TheRealStanLee http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr1CjYpU0AALfYY.jpg
Looking forward to our continued work supporting women’s health, @ppact. #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr2DU75UwAAOaMs.jpg

“I will support Leader Pelosi in her bid for Speaker...I haven’t heard of anyone else stepping up to the plate to run. I think she will do an excellent job. She is experienced and of course, knows how to keep Democrats unified.” -@Deb4CongressNM #NM01 http://www.msnbc.com/weekends-with-alex-witt/watch/will-some-newly-elected-dems-support-nancy-pelosi-for-speaker-1367701571776?v=raila&

Now this is #BlackGirlMagic — all 19 Black women who were running to become judges in Harris County, Texas won their races. 
https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1060747834461511680 QT @thehill All 19 black women running for judge in Texas county win https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/415769-all-19-black-women-running-for-judge-in-texas-county-win http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DriIiJCWoAI4kwG.jpg

“I’m only going to vote for someone that’s aligned with the values of my community. Someone that’s going to fight for healthcare access, lower health care costs, gun reform… @NancyPelosi stands with me on those values. So, the answer is Yes!”-@DebbieforFL https://youtu.be/NTY6jUlawdc?t=435

Congratulations Senator-elect @kyrstensinema on your historic win!
https://twitter.com/kyrstensinema/status/1062147560796614656 QT @kyrstensinema As long as I’ve served Arizona, I’ve worked to help others see our common humanity & find common ground. That’s the same approach I’ll take to representing our great state in the Senate, where I’ll be an independent voice for all Arizonans.

Thank you, Arizona. Let’s get to work. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr2BI6vV4AAE3Xp.jpg

RT @NPR Democratic party leaders say the first legislative vote in the House will come on a magnum opus of provisions they believe will strengthen U.S. democratic institutions and traditions. https://www.npr.org/2018/11/12/665635832/democrats-say-their-first-bill-will-focus-on-strengthening-democracy-at-home?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=2041

“Thank you ⁦@Schriock1⁩ for your endorsement! Looking forward to leading a House Democratic Majority with a diverse and talented wave of ⁦@emilyslist⁩-supported Congresswomen #ForThePeople.”-NP #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dr2lJ60U8AAFIFj.jpg
